name: BestSleepEver
0: ”Alexa, tell Best Sleep Ever to play Rainforest”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: best sleep ever
des:
Best Sleep Ever gets you sleep and keeps you there. The soothing sounds help block out unwanted noise at work or home. Enjoy a better, more peaceful sleep so you can have more energy for those things you enjoy during your waking hours. Perfect for meditation or breathing exercises. Also works well when putting that little one to bed. 

To Enable the Skill: Search for “Best Sleep Ever“ in the Alexa mobile app or at Amazon.com and look for “Best Sleep Ever“ by XXXX. Click the enable button on the Best Sleep Ever skill page.

To Get Started: Say "Alexa open Best Sleep Ever.” 

By default, the sound will loop automatically and play until you say "Alexa, Stop". To limit the time that the sound will play, just say "Alexa, set a sleep timer for 2 hours" or whatever time limit you would like.

Icon image taken from : Freepik
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
